text: Watch the Birdie is the 83rd animated cartoon short subject in the Woody Woodpecker series. Released theatrically on February 24, 1958, the film was produced by Walter Lantz Productions and distributed by Universal International. ==Premise== Woody heckles a birdwatcher intent on studying the woodpecker's every move. ==References== *Cooke, Jon, Komorowski, Thad, Shakarian, Pietro, and Tatay, Jack. "1958". The Walter Lantz Cartune Encyclopedia. title: Watch the Birdie (1958 film)
